website_summaries.verdict: The BenQ W1080ST 3D home entertainment projector offers a short throw, high-quality 1080p video, and 3D, plus it's bright enough to let you leave the lights on.
pros: Works directly with HDMI 1.4a devices like Blu-ray players and cable TV for 2D and full 1080p 3D
cons: Doesn't work with 120Hz DLP-link glasses for 3D

customer_reviews.title: 4 years and going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector in 2013 and I'm writing this review in 2017. I expected the lightbulb to have required a replacement years ago. And yet it hasn't. Perfect, vibrant colors, 3D capability, amazing short throw specs. Best purchase of my life. I use it on daily basis for many hours, sometimes as just a background of a wall sized projection of a picturesque video. Top quality piece of equipment. I have an enormous 140 inch screen in my living room which still amazes me and anyone who witnesses it. They still don't make tvs of this size and I see no reason to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Stanwin

customer_reviews.title: I got 7739 hours out of the original bulb.
customer_reviews.text: This projector is amazing. I have had it now for a little over 18 months and just changed my first bulb. I got 7739 hours out of the original bulb. This projector gets left on all day and night and is used for TV, DVD, XBOX, blu ray, 3d movies etc, etc and every thing comes through crystal clear. The short throw lens is worth every extra penny, I have 125" at just 8 feet distance from the screen.
customer_reviews.author: DrewID

customer_reviews.title: Great projector. I prefer this to my 65" Panasonic ...
customer_reviews.text: Great projector. I prefer this to my 65" Panasonic ZT. My picture covers an entire wall from floor to ceiling, over 200" diagonal. Once you have this, it's hard to go back to smaller tv's. Remote control works great, backlit. Has automatic cooldown when shutting down to protect bulb. Very well thought out. Even has freeze frame. Only 2 HDMI ports, so I'm buying a multiplier. I love putting my laptop picture on the big screen. With Carl's cloth for my screen I have a wonderful very large picture for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Leo P.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a month ago and installed it as a ceiling mount projector using a Projector-Gear Projector Ceiling Mount. At six and a half feet I have a very bright 120" image. So bright that I can use the eco mode and had to turn down the brightness to about 55 percent.. I am truly amazed at the quality of picture. The color is outstanding and I have not seen any halos or rainbows at all. It work out standing for movies and video games. I am going to try out the 3D capabilities as soon as I have the time.
customer_reviews.author: T. Adams

customer_reviews.title: way 2 go BenQ
customer_reviews.text: This is by far an outstanding product for the price. I have not checked out the 3D functionality of it yet. But the image quality, the throw distance, daytime viewing and quiet fan should be enough for your decision. Mine is mounted 4" from my 9' ceiling, approximately 9 feet away from an electric Elite screen and cast a 150" brilliant picture. In the middle of the day, curtains open, you can still enjoy it. You could enjoy it standing 4' away, without your silhouette being part of the image (mounted on a 9' ceiling that is). Oh...and no lag time!
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic purchase at a great price. Using to throw a 130 inch 2:35 to 1 picture onto my screen. Needed this for the short throw in a smaller room and it puts out a great image. I do see a few rainbows here and there as I am stricken with that particular problem, but it is not bad at all. Love DLP even with the RBE. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ggtbi G.

customer_reviews.title: it's amazing! During the night
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I live in an apartment and set up a 10ft screen. With this on, and the windows even semi blocked out, it's amazing! During the night, it's phenomenal! Once you see a good projector in action, you'll never go back. Home theater! Video games! Cons: annoying to set up. That's probably my fault as I have it set on 2 boxes... haha I should look into tables... When people mention that they are in the market to buy a TV, I direct them toward this.
customer_reviews.author: Pterodactyl

customer_reviews.title: Product is great. When connected with Blu ray
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. When connected with Blu ray, clarity is awesome. You can see 1080p on your walls. Great Product from Benq. I am happy to use this product. I am able to connect this projector with my Bose Speaker using external cable. After around one year HDMI Port 1 is not working properly. Still HDMI port 2 is working. So watching movies using that. I am able to connect Google Chromecast also !!! and I can watch movies from youtube... !!! That is great na.....
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Great price for 1080p 3D!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only been running the projector for a couple days now, and so far so good. It was easy to set up, and the menus are pretty self explanatory. I especially love the short throw versatility. Now I can use my Kinect without blocking the lights. I also called BenQ's Tech support for a quick question, and I spoke to someone within a minute. Really great. The only issue so far is trying to figure out my 3D option. A little more time and ill have this mastered.
customer_reviews.author: Alexp

customer_reviews.title: I love this projector!
customer_reviews.text: I have found high quality home theater entertainment in my tiny living room with this projector! I know of no better 1080p short throw projector at this price. I absolutely recommend this to anyone who is looking for a bid clear beautiful picture from a projector that must be 6 feet from the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when we finished our basement to put in our theater room. Works really well, can watch a movie in the middle of the day with no covers on windows and still see the picture perfectly. Really makes watching movies at home fun! We even used it outside on a blow up screen and it was great there too. Our kids keep asking to do it again!
customer_reviews.author: Chee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, great colors
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, great colors. Audio is not so great, as usual with projectors, but pair up with a Bluetooth speaker and you're all set up!
customer_reviews.author: Elvita

customer_reviews.title: I'm most happy that I can use it even with direct sunlight ...
customer_reviews.text: This projector is phenomenal. I'm most happy that I can use it even with direct sunlight hitting the wall and it's still viewable. Movies feel lifelike and games are breathtaking. I also had the power go out while watching something and it was not affected at all! I surely thought it would at least blow a bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Eggplant Pete

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: This was my first projector and it's amazing! The picture quality is really nice and rich, blacks are pretty deep, and with little drag on movements. My seating is about 6-8' from the projector the fan is noticeable at first, but once the movies start it's not a problem. Been using an older pair of BenQ DLP Link 3D Glasses and they work well when needed
customer_reviews.author: DMK

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I mixed this projector with the Silver Ticket HD 16:9 135" screen. I set the projector at 7' 5" from wall and the screen approx 9 inches from the 8 foot ceiling. I have my seating at 9 feet from screen. All I can say is WOW! With some reasonable light discipline this bad boy projector can Blast a serious picture onto the big 135" screen with no problem. Even in eco mode at night its super bright on that monster screen. Just as a reference my wall is 13 feet wide by 8 feet tall. The screen takes up almost the whole wall. WOW WOW. Band of Brothers never looked so awesome
customer_reviews.author: Micky Garand

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an upgrade from my mx511 because i needed a short throw to use my wii and so my guests can stand up and leave the room without disrupting the line of sight. image looks great, currently have it at 16:9 160in. PS4 and blu-rays look amazing
customer_reviews.author: Jake G

customer_reviews.title: best investment ever
customer_reviews.text: I would not know what to do without my ben q! when they say short throw they really mean it. I only need 8 feet for a good 125-150" screen.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Tischer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic projector. The picture is clear even when I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic projector. The picture is clear even when I've nearly maxed out its throw distance. It holds up during the day with the blinds closed and projected onto a white wall. The only two things that would get this to a 5 star is quieter fan(which is only noticeable when movies go silent) and brighter lamp. For what they crammed into this thing for this price, its amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Salem

customer_reviews.title: 100" movie time
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The picture is great. The wife likes to knit so there's always a light on and it still shows up good. For football and MMA I will insist on lights out though. I am having issues with 3d, but that could be user error. Trying to watch the free content from comcast, it won't let me switch to side by side 3d..... first world problem to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: thomas j leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture!
customer_reviews.text: So far this thing is amazing. The images are crisp and clear. We have it projected on a wall with 3 coats of cinema paint, and the picture quality looks amazing. We are thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie F.

customer_reviews.title: If in your price range, stop looking and buy now
customer_reviews.text: You can't get better quality than this at this price point. Great quality and good settings. Although it doesn't have horizontal shift like the other model (non short throw), it still has keystoning correction so you can correct the tilt angle from not being able to use horizontal shift. Also, look up online what color settings are best.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse M

customer_reviews.title: great projector bad lens
customer_reviews.text: this projector is great until i started getting dust blobs on the inside of the lens(supposed to be a sealed lens) the blobs are large and mess with the picture quality. Got a replacement and it did the same thing, now im gone thought 3 w1080st and they all got dust on the inside of the lens 100hrs in. frustrating as there is no way to clean it out without violating the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: applesauce117

customer_reviews.title: Love this projector
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! The built in speaker sounds like that of a cheap laptop, but I have it setup with my 7.1 surround sound, so doesnt matter. Great picture! The only thing that is annoying is when flipping through cable channels and it has to switch from 480-1080p, takes 5-10 seconds to display.
customer_reviews.author: AZGUY82

customer_reviews.title: Best Projector in the World!
customer_reviews.text: Super and Consistent Quality. Easy to set-up. 3d experience could've been better if they supported RF technology glasses. 2d-3d conversion is a miss. For 3d use Estar glasses and stay away from the benqs - overpriced and defective. Great Short Throw projector for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Karan Aggarwal

customer_reviews.title: This product is Fantastic..
customer_reviews.text: This product is Fantastic........Great Picture .......and the 3d Movies are Fantastic.........Wouldn't hesitate buying this one again........I've had it about 2 years.......Five Stars all the Way .
customer_reviews.author: ron beck

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture! For future help make sure the lense ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing picture! For future help make sure the lense is exactly centered with the screen! If you get 3 corners to line up and the 4th doesn't it means the projector isn't centered.
customer_reviews.author: Fabricator

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent focus. VERY disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Got my 1000$ full HD projector and discovered it has focus inconsistencies issues. Bottom part of image is not in focus when upper part is and vice-versa. I found other users reporting the same issues on google. Now I am back in my country, after buying it during a business trip, and I really hope it has global warranty. Waiting for answer from benq........ 2nd benq product in my life, and 2nd time I have low-end product issues on a mid-upscale product.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality with great price on Amazon...
customer_reviews.text: This projector is awesome. The best part is bigger screen with shorter distance from screen.. I love it. i can make big screen with less distance from screen. clear and bright. Makes little sound when you have quite scene in movie but not of a big issue. set is is easy and no need to calibrate much. 3D is somewhat good you see little dragging but i would say that is not a big issue that having this great projector with so much of pros with great price..
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for maybe 6 months now and I still love it. We use the crap out of it too. I don't look forward to replacing the bulb :(
customer_reviews.author: P B Mars

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first projector and at my family are absolute impressed with performance of this projector. Crisp and clear images, 2D incredible quaity. 3D is amazing! I do not have a HDMI 1.4 3D source, but with a HDMI 1.3 media player (PBO) in 1080i 60Hz and selecting "3D SBS" on Benq it produces excellent results. I recommend it !!!
customer_reviews.author: GASTON PALACIO

customer_reviews.title: It arrived promptly and was very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an expert on projectors, I purchased this as a gift to myself not fully understanding what I was buying. It arrived promptly and was very easy to set up. I have a very tiny room right now and with a throw of about 6-7 feet, it fills an entire twin sized bed sheet. Despite the poor screen the picture is absolutely awesome, and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Adams

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Pro +Great Picture Con -Inability to adjust lens throwing angle. This required the mount to be extremely important for making adjustments -Required Firmware update for some features to be activated The firmware update is not a simple process and require tech knowledge
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Picture
customer_reviews.text: Best picture you could ask for! We stopped going to the movie theaters because now we have 100" of beautiful picture that we can pause, rewind, and watch over and over. The picture quality is impeccable, even in daylight! Adjusting wasn't easy, but it looks amazing now!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture I get a picture of 105"from 6 feet
customer_reviews.text: Amazing picture I get a picture of 105"from 6 feet . Only issue is manually removing and reattaching the lens cap may cause the focus to change if one is not careful. Picture quality is excellent . I am using 3d glasses from sansonic Which work perfectly. An excellent buy at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Uddyalok

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT PROJECTOR
customer_reviews.text: This is my second projector and I love it.This replaced a viewsonic7820 and there is a big difference between the two. It's just like being at the movies. I am watching this on a 125 inch screen and the picture shows as good as any tv I own. I recommend this projector you can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Phillips

customer_reviews.title: I have been burning the midnight oil with this great machine. Already bought a replacement lamp cause I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been burning the midnight oil with this great machine. Already bought a replacement lamp cause I know I am burning the original one up in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Bluefootedboobie

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Great Picture.
customer_reviews.text: Love this projector. Great picture. Football games are the best and late night family movies are awesome, especially with amazon Prime. :)
customer_reviews.author: Coach Parker

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived as expected. Quality of the product was superb, and I am very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Sheng

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my 92" screen
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 92" screen. I have it ceiling mounted and use it mainly for gaming. Good picture even in day light.
customer_reviews.author: Hagen Last

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Stellar!
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty amazing what less than a grand gets you these days. I have this projecting a 134" picture on a white wall. Just stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: I like this projector but didn't really realize how short the throw was on it. The short throw works as it should. There isn't much room for error when mounting it on the ceiling. I had to adjust mine 3 times before it was right. This was a replacement for an epson that quit working properly right after the 2 year warranty was up. Hope this one last longer. I've got my eye on JVC 4k projector now when the prices drop under 4k. I'm no professional when it comes to picking apart the picture on these so I'll leave those comments to the pros. Haven't used the 3D function yet either so not comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: M. LEEP

customer_reviews.title: Good intro to big screen viewing
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying the at home big screen experience. I had always wanted to have a large screen home theater and feel that I have that now with BenQ W1080st. I do notice the rainbow effect in high contrast situations but felt it was a small price to pay for an otherwise wonderful large screen experience. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Running very nice and using it since 2015 ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Running very nice and using it since 2015 untill now (about 2 years). No problems. Thanks for the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Selvakumar

customer_reviews.title: Great little projector.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of this projector. Very clear picture and am enjoying toe 120"+ screen. Feels like I'm at the theater.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Geek Guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great projector for the money, only wish the shadow detail was a little better. Overall very happy. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Full HD projector for its price. Short throw makes it very practical and saves you a lot of space. Pro: Brightness, contrast and image quality are outstanding. Cons: A little bit noisy, and built-in speakers sound quality is poor compared to the image.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Angora

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for movies and sports
customer_reviews.text: Nice price for entry into home theater in 13 x 13 ft room using short throw lens unit on a small end table
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: For this being my first projector, I was hesitant on spending $1000. Now, I am glad I did!! This thing is bright, clear, sharp, and just a beautiful. Its only about 6ft. away from my wall and it has a screen size of about 90"-100"!!! My friends projector was also about $1000 but mine blows his out of the water. The hdmi is a big plus for my ps3 and games are even clearer than my 32" samsung tv. A very nice projector for yhe price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Silver Phoenix54

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous on purchasing first projector . this was an awesome value. I use on 100 inch screen. Everyone is amazed on the picture quality. A real winner here. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: ... 4ft is all the distance you need for this bad
customer_reviews.text: 3ft to 4ft is all the distance you need for this bad boy
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Picture
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture for this price range. The short throw distance is perfect for my media room: 100'inch screen is covered from just 5 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Redmond, WA

customer_reviews.title: excellent for reduced space home theater
customer_reviews.text: Excellent projector for a home theater on reduced space. its unique short throw and full HD capabilities would astonish all your friends on the next Super Sunday, or with the new blockbuster film. Black levels are acceptable and lumenes are more than enough for a short throw. very good quality price ratio.
customer_reviews.author: Edmundo Coy

customer_reviews.title: I love this projector!
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector. I read reviews that it was loud but I think it's pretty quiet actually. The picture quality is amazing with bluray!
customer_reviews.author: Steven LaPorte

customer_reviews.title: great projector
customer_reviews.text: The short throw qualities of this projector make it super easy to set up.. Just throw it on a coffee table, plug in a laptop or other, and turn it on and you have a giant movie theater. The built in speaker even works well, but buying a whole speaker system is recommended to boost your home theater to the next level.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: works great , after a lot of research it paid off...
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the distance it's flexibility to use in the litter room, the scene is very bright and beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's like having IMAX at home
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading the review by Sally Ortiz - enough said! My projector is placed between 6' - 7' from the wall and projects a giant image (approx. 9' wide, 6' high).
customer_reviews.author: Kartik Nagappa

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best I could find for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best I could find for the money. I love the image and quality al around.
customer_reviews.author: WHy gEoff

customer_reviews.title: BenQ
customer_reviews.text: This is my first projector and everybody including myself loves it. The picture is amazing. I would suggest this item to everyone. I am still waiting on my 82 inch projector, but it currently using a plain wall, and it still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: t-thriller03

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought an Epson Powerlite 2000 at first. I wasn't happy with the quality of picture and realized that a short throw would be better for my small space. This works great and the picture quality is very nice! I like it and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Schuler

customer_reviews.title: Great picture would buy it again in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.text: Picture is outstanding. Very little noise. Sturdy without focus or zoom issues. I would buy it again. The only odd feature is that the VGA-in is upside down.
customer_reviews.author: A. O. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and versatile home video projector
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and versatile home video projector. Easy to set up and compatible with a wide variety of sources. Comes with a handy bag for portability.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great projector. Crisp image. Fills a 115" screen from 6' away. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: DWilkes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome picture.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome picture.. 1080 for cheap! At 900hrs and it is still as bright as day one.. Use everyday all day.. Quiet and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Lukas Platt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This projector is amazing. I only need to sit it about 3 feet from the screen to get a nine foot image. Beautiful and wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Jay H. Beck

customer_reviews.title: small lite projector
customer_reviews.text: The projector is very nice. I only have problems when plugging in the hdmi cable..it seems a little loose and is hard to connect..you have to jiggle it a little. I guesd if your the type of person that usesIit as a home system and plugs the hdmi in once its great. But I take to shows and use it and im always praying when I jiggle it a little it will work. So far its been working
customer_reviews.author: jimmywenger

customer_reviews.title: Wow Factor
customer_reviews.text: Great Projector building myself a Man Cave have not quite finished, but have veiwed a few movies on a blank wall without a screen. Colors were vivid and will show much better after screen is installed. Have a Dark basement but even after turning on lights could see screen. Can't wait until I'm finish and really enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Holden

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Tried the Optoma GT1080 first and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Tried the Optoma GT1080 first and this blows it away. Got it set at around a 244 inch screen on a white wall. Excellent picture.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great projector almost ended up getting a optoma but the short throw convinience gives you flexibility regardless of the space. I use it for home theater setup
customer_reviews.author: Adolfo

customer_reviews.title: my first projector de calidad
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best, sharp quality 3D image my first projector and I think I was not wrong in the decision
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Arvelaez

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting to lose some quality with the short-throw, but the quality is def. HD. Very pleased with BenQ.
customer_reviews.author: IronDad21

customer_reviews.title: good qualety and great value
customer_reviews.text: This is my first projector. i choose this model - over the W1070 because of the short throw optics :allows a more immersive expirience in a narrow rooms, and during games like Kinect \ move - the player do not interupt the way of the projected beam. and another nice thing - the remote i got is the remote of the W1500 (back lit remote, and better built) and not the old W1070 remote. so i think the ship all W1080st with the better W1500 remote. the only cons i found was the lack of lens shift.
customer_reviews.author: yoni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Picture quality for my needs. Very bright even in a room with white walls and ambient light
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Hui

customer_reviews.title: Amazing video quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing video quality. I used a 135 inch screen and it could easily fill a larger screen. The 3d is stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great projector! I should've brought one of these a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: last2dimes

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I saw this power up I was in impressed. I love this Projector, the picture quality is great and there is little to no distortion while watching football or fast moving games. 3D works so good makes most TV's look like crap. the depth on 3D is impressive.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This projector meet all of my expections. The picture is so clear and crisp. I also plug in my ps3 which I love!!!! I would so recommend this projector to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Kunz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This projector has exceeded my expectations. The picture is amazing! It is also very easy to use and set up
customer_reviews.author: David Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Projector
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our small church and it is perfect as it is really close to the screen and takes up little space. The picture is fantastic and so clear.
customer_reviews.author: John Kurko

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture! Very Bright! 100 inch screen from only 6 feet!
customer_reviews.author: jason board

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice projector for the price. Amazon is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Early

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product .. Superseded my expectations !! One of the best purchases I ever did .
customer_reviews.author: Randeep

customer_reviews.title: Better Than A Theater
customer_reviews.text: 1080p, sufficient lumens for a bright, sharp picture on a 10 ft. wide screen. DLP technology has come a long way - no visible hatching round individual pixels. Colors are vibrant with excellent contrast. Love the short throw with little to no distortion corner to corner. Couldn't afford the LED version so went with a lamp for now.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Lasiter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent projector, even after 1 year of heavy use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent projector, even after 1 year of heavy use, brightness is still very good for a moderately light controlled room. Have it ceiling mounted/inverted. Some light bleed onto the ceiling, but nothing like older projectors.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Short Throw - BIG Picture
customer_reviews.text: Small room - big picture, great picture quality for movies, gaming, sports and general overall tv watching. Projected on a bare painted wall with high gloss paint. Spectacular!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lee D. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Projector
customer_reviews.text: This Projector is amazing! No matter the space you have you will get an amazingly large picture that looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Just looking

customer_reviews.title: Go with Benq is a great product
customer_reviews.text: It was the best item I bought clear the 3d awesome could not imagine a projector have that kind of quality is even better then my 3d tv I have at home wich is only 42 inches and the glasse I got is compatible with benq st 1080 even when the model number is different it works great 40$ for two pairs not bad love it thanks benq and amazon for this great product
customer_reviews.author: zulay rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product and delivery service!
customer_reviews.text: Awsome! I just concerned about the high temperature but this is my first one and I dont know if this is normal. Im in loved with quality of the image. Very recomended!
customer_reviews.author: Marcos A. Da Conceicao

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfect picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several projectors and this my second short throw and hands down this is the best short throw projector you can buy. This is the main reason I bought this projector for the flexibility it gives you. The picture quality is perfect nice sharp and great blacks. For the money there is not a better projector in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: qwl0701

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfect
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to say but..... I love it. Price and picture quality you can't beat it. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: After 1 year...
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with my 137 inch tv but a year later, I have replaced the lamp witch is to be expected but I think the color wheel needs to be replaced now witch I wouldn't mind so much but I can't find a replacement. I get hot spots, it's hard to describe. The color doesn't fade correctly.
customer_reviews.author: dragon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect my small home theater
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this to the ceiling. Because of the throw angle it is about a foot lower than I'd like it to be. The picture is amazing; it looks like a huge HD TV. The menu is easy as set up is a breeze. After reading some reviews i was nervous about the sound; however, it is very quite and doesn't deter from the enjoyment it brings. I can't wait for Sunday! 92" of 1080p NFL Sunday Ticket Max!
customer_reviews.author: Matt F.

customer_reviews.title: Works very for short distances.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector to use in our basement which required a short mounting distance. We have a horizontal bar on the ceiling that prevented the a long throw distance. I bought this benQ and it works superbly. Also I bought a refurbished one as it provided good value for money. All is working fine and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: It is a great machine! This one is a little brighter and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second BenQ projector. It is a great machine! This one is a little brighter and has a shorter throw. Love the home theater experience.
customer_reviews.author: ARTHUR  ROCKETT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Projector
customer_reviews.text: I no longer need to go to the movie theaters. The new projector is crystal clear and produce the best picture I have ever seen in comparison to it. I highly recommend it for anyone considering on purchasing one in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Joe saldivar

customer_reviews.title: Great picture but problems cropping every few days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from amazon & got it shipped to India, picture quality was great & everything worked great for a week or so, but then the remote control started having problems, it does not work from a distance & by distance I mean only if i stick it to the projector (1/2 inch distance) then it works (I changed the batteries, tried different ones, but same result)...now 2 days back the audio out has stopped working & even the speaker does not work.. real poor quality control from a company like Benq... I wish I had not made this purchase...
customer_reviews.author: VRT

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: everything is good. just a little bit hot after watch a movie. overall i like this product want recommend to my friends
customer_reviews.author: monkey

customer_reviews.title: then everything is fine, nice 1080p
customer_reviews.text: Mine goes off in the first 5min, then everything is fine, nice 1080p image
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: What an outstanding device. I have 100 inches of HD Madness. the speaker is pretty loud although I live in a small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Frank1

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for the money
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing that you can get a 1080p 3d projector with a rated bulb life of 5000 hours for 1 grand. The projector is bright and has great color, focus and screen uniformity. I've owned the infocus 4805, samsung sp710, and the panasonic ae900. I also currently have the panasonic ae2000, ae4000, and ax200 projectors and the optoma gt700. The 1080st beats them all except for the ae2000 and ae4000 which have better black levels. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

product_meta.title: BenQ W1080ST 1080p 3D Short Throw DLP Home Theater Projector (White)
product_meta.description: DLP projector - 3D - 2000 ANSI lumens - 1920 x 1080 - widescreen - HD 1080p
feature_bullets: Picture Modes: Dynamic, Standard, Cinema, 3D, User 1, User 2, User 3
Showcase Full-HD content in sharp, 1080P HD and enjoy Blu-ray, video games and HD broadcasting in beautiful, high-contrast quality without downscaling or compression
SmartEco Mode cleverly adjusts the lamp power to maximize power saving by delivering the best contrast and brightness performance using only as much light as needed
Eco Blank mode allows you to cut the lamp's power consumption by 70% while you pause your activity

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars233 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
